title: Emerald & Diamond Grand Haaram - COHAR00031
materials: High-Quality Polki Diamonds. Features the signature Hyderabadi polish for lasting luster.
features: This magnificent Haaram features a stunning combination of square-cut and round-cut emeralds, meticulously set amidst a field of glittering polki diamonds. The design incorporates traditional South Indian floral motifs, with each flower intricately handcrafted. The intricate setting enhances the brilliance of the diamonds and emeralds. The overall design has a modern touch with the emerald's cut and clarity.
occasions: and other significant traditional Telugu ceremonies.
description: This Grand Haaram is a timeless masterpiece, blending traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The use of high-quality emeralds and polki diamonds ensures a breathtaking sparkle. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this piece is an heirloom to be treasured for generations. The impeccable craftsmanship and the use of only the finest materials make this Haaram a valuable investment and a symbol of enduring beauty.
